content: the verdant blooms blanket is a cozy botanical-inspired crochet project perfect for sunny spring days or a gorgeous gift for any plant lover in your life its granny square construction makes it easy to customize the size as you like from a baby blanket to a full-size bedspread its an easy but very delicate and elegant looking pattern for intermediate crocheters who love creating different patterns and textures the example shown is made of a 7 x 10 granny square grid and measures about 1 65m x 1 10m a project of this size uses about 22 skeins of hobbii friends cotton *~ 2 300m* with each square measuring approximately 16cm however you can substitute with any of your favourite yarns just keep in mind that the size of the granny squares may vary depending on the weight
